content: *a sweet treat in the afternoon with some knitting and a cup of tea is one of my favourite things to do before the busyness of teatime and getting ready for work or school the next day this collection is inspired by some of my favourites all bringing delightful memories of picking fruits from the garden and baking with my granny… sweet comfort * a top down sock with heel flap and gusset the sock starts by using a contrast colour and working a long rib with a finishing row inspired by the fluted top of the pastry on a cherry pie the eyelet pattern is worked on the front of the sock only which makes for a relaxing and quick knit sizes small medium large finished sock circumference unstretched 19 21 5 24 cm / 7 5 8 5 9 5 skill level a basic understanding of sock construction how to work knits purls slip stitches increases decreases and kitchener stitch this pattern has been tested and tech edited you can find kits over at https //www adventuresinyarncraft co uk/ 1 https //www adventuresinyarncraft co uk/
